author: rahul
msg: Changes to test case that should have been part of r728828 (Add support for the SCXML Script Module).

The m2 build is not running the javascript package tests (though the pom does include org/apache/commons/scxml/env/javascript/EnvJavaScriptTestSuite.java in the surefire configuration). It'd be great if someone else can try to spot the hang up.
